segments.text: I see the girl standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised the stool hasn’t tipped over yet—it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely clueless, just drying that same plate over and over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to turn around and catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and the floor is getting dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to be careful, but I don’t want to scare them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where you just watch and hope nothing bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is pouring out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR
